ygData.subject: Re: [eqbard] A Bard's usefulness after lvl 12
ygData.msgSnippet: Has the lullaby song been fixed or improved?  When I first bought it a level 15, I was unable to lull even a widow hatchling.  To me that is kind of useless.
ygData.messageBody:
Has the lullaby song been fixed or improved? When I first bought it a
level 15, I was unable to lull even a widow hatchling. To me that is kind
of useless. Perhaps I have improved. As for finding better friends, I
have tried but it is hard at the moment. I am in an inbetween situation.
All of my friends are either in teh 12-14 range or in the 18 and above
range. It usually makes it hard for me adventure forth. I am just hoping
that this lack of people wishing to party witha bard does not get any
worse. I am more of a social player if I get in a good group, but those
are so hard to find nowadays. Either you bump into power gamers who steal
kills and train you to death, or you find those newbies who constantly ask
you to help them find your corpse ). As a level 16 bard, what is the best
place for exp? I usually solo at this point and would like to find a
place that gives really good exp and decent loot.

BTW Did people actually right in a character description in their
character screen? I have and nobody looks at it. They just query my
armor and then run away. It frustrates me so because I have been trying
to roleplay my characters background. Perhaps it is a time to compose a
tune to sing everytime I have time to myself, emoting doesn't even seem to
give a hint to anyone at all.

Treilanin - Karana - Bard of the 16th Rank
